description: A person who has become famous on the internet. 「V」 stands for Verified. It can be considered a title given to influencers. On Weibo blogs and Douyin (TikTok), if you have more than 500,000 followers, a 「V」 icon is displayed next to the account name.

examples.translation: How many Weibo followers do you need to be considered a Big V?
TikTok Big V Influencer Popularity Ranking
